org.apache.activemq.core.server.cluster.ha

Interface HAPolicy<T extends Activation>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BackupPolicy, ColocatedPolicy, LiveOnlyPolicy, ReplicaPolicy, ReplicatedPolicy, SharedStoreMasterPolicy, SharedStoreSlavePolicy

    public interface HAPolicy<T extends Activation>
    Every live server will have an HAPolicy that configures the type of server that it should be either live, backup or colocated (both). It also configures how, if colocated, it should react to sending and receiving requests for backups.
